TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PrintingPermissionLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of printing that code is allowed to do.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel AllPrinting = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Provides full access to all printers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel DefaultPrinting = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Provides printing programmatically to the default printer, along with safe printing through semirestricted dialog box. DefaultPrinting is a subset of AllPrinting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel NoPrinting = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Prevents access to printers. NoPrinting is a subset of SafePrinting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel SafePrinting = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Provides printing only from a restricted dialog box. SafePrinting is a subset of DefaultPrinting.
